verbs.description: By [V: electing] [ARG1: Trump] and tolerating Bolton , America has shown it is not a trustworthy steward of the free world . The damage gets deeper by the day .
By electing Trump and [V: tolerating] [ARG1: Bolton] , [ARG0: America] has shown it is not a trustworthy steward of the free world . The damage gets deeper by the day .
By electing Trump and tolerating Bolton , America [V: has] shown it is not a trustworthy steward of the free world . The damage gets deeper by the day .
[ARGM-MNR: By electing Trump and tolerating Bolton] , [ARG0: America] has [V: shown] [ARG1: it is not a trustworthy steward of the free world] . The damage gets deeper by the day .
By electing Trump and tolerating Bolton , America has shown [ARG1: it] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: a trustworthy steward of the free world] . The damage gets deeper by the day .
By electing Trump and tolerating Bolton , America has shown it is not a trustworthy steward of the free world . [ARG1: The damage] [V: gets] [ARG2: deeper] [ARGM-TMP: by the day] .
